body:

Sirius: ...me!
James: (lifts up his leg to reveal the go-go boots he's wearing)

summary: Dumbledore seeing Harry's year six potions grades went one of two ways...
title: Dumbledore seeing Harry's year six potions grades went one of two ways...
body:
Slughorn: *turns in grades*
Dumbledore: Damn, you're laying it on a little thick.
or...
Slughorn: *turns in grades*
Dumbledore: Oh wow, Harry just needed a different approach.
Dumbledore: 
Dumbledore: I am SO good at hiring teachers.

summary:
THIS STUPID BLOG REACHED 100 FOLLOWERS!!!!!

OMG I never thought that this day will come.... to 100 amazing persons who care...
caption:
THIS STUPID BLOG REACHED 100 FOLLOWERS!!!!!

OMG I never thought that this day will come…. to 100 amazing persons who care about me and my drawings, you guys are my greatest motivation to get up and try to draw something, I deeply appreciate your support ❤❤❤
Special thanks for people who liked and reblogged my stuff, I love it when I turn on the wifi and get 20+ noti, it’s really one of the best feeling in life.
Also dear people who wrote something/tag something when you reblog: KEEP GOING, I READ ALL OF YOUR REBLOGS AND YOU ARE MY FAVORITE KIND OF HUMAN

So here is a drawing of Voldemort being forced to send you guys love and appreciation, please keep supporting me (and ignoring my mistakes/laziness) 💖

I have loved books ever since I was a little girl. If I could spend my whole day reading, I would. Life unfortunately gets in the way. It's rude, really.

2019 Reading Challenge

Mary has read 3 books toward her goal of 55 books.

summary: I just remembered that when I was in the 9th grade, I read some sort of “unofficial guide to the world of harry potter” and came...
body:
I just remembered that when I was in the 9th grade, I read some sort of “unofficial guide to the world of harry potter” and came upon one of the craziest theories ever - mind you, this was prior to the end of the series, not even Order of the Phoenix was out. 

The theory proposed that James Potter was still alive and was actually in Lupin’s body, having been put there through some sort of switching spell. So Lupin was in James’ body the night that Voldemort attacked the Potters and he was the one killed then. They offered pretty convincing arguments as well - honestly, I was pretty sold on it at one point.

reblog.comment:

The theory proposed that James Potter was still alive and was actually in Lupin’s body, having been put there through some sort of switching spell. So Lupin was in James’ body the night that Voldemort attacked the Potters and he was the one killed then. They offered pretty convincing arguments as well - honestly, I was pretty sold on it at one point.

trail.content_raw:
I just remembered that when I was in the 9th grade, I read some sort of “unofficial guide to the world of harry potter” and came upon one of the craziest theories ever - mind you, this was prior to the end of the series, not even Order of the Phoenix was out. 

The theory proposed that James Potter was still alive and was actually in Lupin’s body, having been put there through some sort of switching spell. So Lupin was in James’ body the night that Voldemort attacked the Potters and he was the one killed then. They offered pretty convincing arguments as well - honestly, I was pretty sold on it at one point.
trail.content:
I just remembered that when I was in the 9th grade, I read some sort of “unofficial guide to the world of harry potter” and came upon one of the craziest theories ever - mind you, this was prior to the end of the series, not even Order of the Phoenix was out. 

The theory proposed that James Potter was still alive and was actually in Lupin’s body, having been put there through some sort of switching spell. So Lupin was in James’ body the night that Voldemort attacked the Potters and he was the one killed then. They offered pretty convincing arguments as well - honestly, I was pretty sold on it at one point.

blog.name: yourdarklordriddle
blog.title: Tom Marvolo Riddle
blog.description: I can make bad things happen to people who are mean with me

summary: Tomione: 10 Ways Hermione reacts to His “I love you”
body:
Tomione: 10 Ways Hermione reacts to His “I love you”

1. Dumbfounded

2. Suspicious: “Did you kill someone? Torture? Set the Ministry on fire?”

3. Worried: “Are you under Amortentia?”

4. Surprised

5. “I need a drink”


6. Emotional

7. SUPER emotional (Hysterical)

8. Confused: “Is it a joke? What’s the fuck is going on?”

9. Denial

10. “Oh, Tom, I love you too” (Every Tomione Fan’s Dream 💖)

summary:
Minerva: What's happening here?
Harry: Professor Malfoy took points off a Gryffindor because she was "being stupid"
Draco:...
body:
Minerva: What's happening here?
Harry: Professor Malfoy took points off a Gryffindor because she was "being stupid"
Draco: Professor Potter took points off a Slytherin because he was "beheaving dangerously" in DADA
Minerva: If you two don't quit this attitude, I'll be the next one taking points off Gryffindor and Slytherin for "being dangerously stupid"

summary: Quote: “Giving him the tour? Come through to the back, Harry, that's where we’re making the real money - pocket anything, you,...
caption:
Quote: “Giving him the tour? Come through to the back, Harry, that’s where we’re making the real money - pocket anything, you, and you’ll pay in more than Galleons!” he added warningly to a small boy who hastily whipped his hand of the tube labelled: Edible Dark Marks - They’ll Make Anyone Sick! (Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince)

Item: Weasleys’ Wizard Wheezes - Product Catalogue

As seen in: Harry Potter Film Wizardry
